TopicTitle: Undocking Action removed from KAL-1000 and action groups

Articles.Content:
I am trying to build a Cargo SSTO and it has a cargo lift. I was adding in docking clamps to make sure the lift was secure when it was in the up position and I cannot find the undock feature in either the KAL-1000 editor or action groups, You still have the option to decouple node however not undocking.

I was able to do this in previous updates but not anymore, could somebody help me please?

( I know it is probably obvious but I cannot seem to be able to solve the problem )

It was part of 1.11 update. 

Players can no longer assign the Undock node Action. This has been removed as it was causing confusion with the Decouple node Action in some parts. Crafts with the action assigned can still fire it.
idk how I missed that lol
